sources.title: MyLiveLinks Homepage
sources.summary: Share your links, make posts, go live, and get paid! Join the MyLiveLinks community.
key_facts: MyLiveLinks is the unified home for live streaming, profiles, and feeds.
Creators can link out, host live rooms, and monetize through coin packs.

sources.title: Repository README
sources.summary: One link. Every live. MyLiveLinks is a production-grade, monetized, enterprise-scale web platform for group live streaming.
key_facts: 12 video boxes (6Ã—2 grid) keep every participant visible.
Demand-based publishing only streams when viewers are present.
Coins are purchase-only; no free drip or passive accrual.
